item.title: 004. Seoul, South Korea
item.description:
Seoul, South Korea #

  • City: é¦–çˆ¾ (sau2 ji5)
  • Country: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· éŸ“åœ‹ (hon4 gwok3)

Seoul is the capital city of South Korea, a fascinating country in East Asia ğŸŒ. This vibrant city is full of interesting sights ğŸŒŸ, delicious food ğŸ², and amazing people!

Where Is Seoul? ğŸ“ #

Seoul is located in the northwestern part of South Korea, quite close to the border with North Korea ğŸ—ºï¸. It sits along the Han River ğŸï¸, which divides the city into two halves. If you look at a map, you can find Seoul at these coordinates: 37.532600, 127.024612.

item.title: 009. Singapore
item.description:
Singapore, Singapore #

  • City: æ–°åŠ å¡ (san1 gaa3 bo1)
  • Country: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ æ–°åŠ å¡ (san1 gaa3 bo1)

Singapore is a small island city-state located in Southeast Asia, right at the southern tip of the Malay Peninsula. Even though it’s one of the 20 smallest countries in the world, Singapore is packed with amazing things to see and do! ğŸŒâœ¨

Where Is It? ğŸ“ #

Singapore sits just 85 miles north of the Equator and consists of one main diamond-shaped island plus about 60 tiny islets. It’s separated from Malaysia by the Straits of Johor to the north and from Indonesia by the Singapore Strait to the south. ğŸŒŠğŸ—ºï¸

item.title: 011. Osaka
item.description:
Osaka, Japan #

  • City: å¤§é˜ª (daai6 baan2)
  • Country: ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ æ—¥æœ¬ (jat6 bun2)

Osaka, a bustling city in Japan ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ, is full of history ğŸ“œ, culture ğŸ, and excitement ğŸ‰. Located in the Kansai region on the island of Honshu, Osaka is the third-largest city in Japan, with a population of approximately 2.7 million people. Known for its friendly locals ğŸ˜„, delicious food ğŸœ, and vibrant entertainment districts ğŸ­, Osaka is often referred to as “Japan’s Kitchen” due to its rich culinary tradition. This article will introduce you to Osaka’s location ğŸŒ, one special sightseeing spot ğŸï¸, its language ğŸ—£ï¸ and food ğŸ½ï¸, a famous musician ğŸµ and scientist ğŸ”¬ from the city, and a fun fact about this fascinating place.

item.title: 015. Tehran
item.description:
Tehran, Iran #

  • City: å¾·é»‘è˜­ (dak1 hak1 laan4)
  • Country: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡· ä¼Šæœ— (ji1 long5)

Tehran, the vibrant capital of Iran, sits at the foot of the towering Alborz Mountains â›°ï¸. This bustling city blends ancient history ğŸº with modern energy âš¡, making it a fascinating place to explore!

Population and Growth ğŸ“ˆ #

Did you know that Tehran is home to almost 10 million people? As of 2025, the population is estimated at 9,730,000. That’s a lot of people! In fact, Tehran has grown tremendously over time. Back in 1950, only about 1 million people lived there. Today, Tehran is not only the largest city in Iran but also the 30th largest city in the world ğŸŒ.
